entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming north 20 gusting to 40 early this morning then becoming northeast 20 near noon. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:50 AM AST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to zero by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning late this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 7 this evening. Forecast issued 05:50 AM AST Thursday 05 January 2023
